column1: Asturian: bañu  Catalan: bany  Corsican: bagnu  French: bain  Friulian: bagn  Galician: baño  Greek: μπάνιο ‎(bánio) (borrowed)  Italian: bagno  Occitan: banh  Old Portuguese: banno  Portuguese: banho
column3: Romanian: baie  Romansch: bogn  Russian: баня ‎(banja) (borrowed)  Sicilian: bagnu, vagnu  Spanish: baño  Turkish: banyo (borrowed)  Venetian: bagno  Walloon: bagn
